text_syntoms: I've been losing my appetite, and I also have trouble swallowing. My nose has been running, and I have a sore throat.
I have put on a lot of weight and am now very obese. I have different urges and different appetites.
I have nasal congestion and a blocked nose. On occasion, during the night, I have stiffness and chest pain. Additionally, I've lost my senses of taste and smell.
I have been suffering from back pain, a chronic cough, and weakness in my arms and legs. My neck hurts and I have been feeling dizzy and off balance
I'm having joint discomfort in my fingers, wrists, and knees. The pain is frequently aching and throbbing, and it worsens when I move my joints.
